description:
Driving Academy is the most realistic driving, parking & car game!
Enjoy driving with realistic road signs while you play our games. Take driving and car parking lessons with this authentic car simulator. Enroll in the virtual driving simulator school called Driving Academy and test your car driving & parking skills - without having to go to an actual driving school! Drive your favorite cars and learn to drive in this fun car game!
Driving Academy is the ultimate free car parking simulator game. Buckle up, drive, steer & learn to drive a car and follow road rules in this fun car game. Advance your skills to unlock cool cars and become a great driver!
Test your skills with fun driving games & a realistic simulator. Download the driving simulator for free today!
Driving Academy Game Features:
It’s time to experience real-life car driving lessons in this fun and free car simulator game!
🚗 80+ unique road signs to learn while you play this game
🚗 250 levels to drive and play, like the Grand Tests, City Parking, City Driving, Night Driving, and other car parking challenges
🚗 3 different camera car views
🚗 Realistic car mechanics
🚗 135+ cars to drive – drive your dream car!
🚗 Customize your cars with cool Paint Finishes, Neon Lights, Decals, Rims, Spoilers and convert them into Police Cars.
Enjoy driving with lots of car skills to learn
250 fun levels with 80+ unique road signs to learn and master as a driver. You can experience real-life manual driving & car parking in Driving Academy and improve your skills. Our game is that good!
Improve your car parking skills with our driving school
Try our Challenges Mode: 150 unique car game challenges will test you on everything you learned in the Academy mode. Test how good of a car driver you are with our driving games.
Experience driving tons of cars
Play & drive 135+ different cars across global brands. With realistic mechanics and controls, you'll feel like you're actually in the car of your dreams in our simulator!
Learn about driving & car parking in the most fun way possible with our car game!
Minimum Requirement :
2GB RAM | Android 4.0 or later | Device powered by an ARMv7 (Cortex family) CPU | GPU support for OpenGLES 2.0 is recommended
Please note that we use Advertising ID for serving better ads and improving the product through Analytics.
VISIT US: http://games2win.com
LIKE US: http://facebook.com/Games2win
FOLLOW US: http://twitter.com/Games2win
You can reach out to the developer on androidapps@games2win.com for any feedback and issues that you might have with this parking game.
Privacy Policy: http://www.games2win.com/corporate/privacy-policy.asp
